#!/usr/bin/env Rscript

I) Statistiques descriptive

Exercice 0

cats <- read.table(file="cats.txt", sep=" ", header=T)
names(cats)
nrow(cats)

Exercice 1

1)

names(cats)

2)

length(cats)

3)

cats[1:10,]
attach(cats)

Exercice 2

1)

mean(Bwt)
quantile(Bwt, 0.5)
quantile(Bwt, 0.25)
quantile(Bwt, 0.5)
quantile(Bwt, 0.75)
var(Bwt)
sd(Bwt)
diff(range(Bwt))
IQR(Bwt)

2)

summary(cats)

Exercice 3

1)

boxplot(Hwt, Bwt)
boxplot(Bwt, Hwt)

hist(Bwt, breaks=10)
hist(Hwt, breaks=10, col="green")

par(mfrow=c(1,1))
boxplot(Bwt)
boxplot(Bwt, Hwt)

Exercice 4

histo = hist(Bwt)
histo$counts

II) Variable Qualitative

class(Sex)
levels(Sex)

Exercice 5

table(Sex)
prop <- table(Sex)/length(Sex)
barplot(prop)
plot(prop)
pie(prop)

boxplot(var.num ~ var.facteur)

Exercice 6

boxplot(Bwt ~ Sex)
boxplot(Hwt ~ Sex)

Exercice 7

1)

plot(Bwt, Hwt)

2)

cov(Bwt, Hwt)
cor(Bwt, Hwt)

3)

plot(Hwt, Bwt)
